name: Creamy Steak 'n Onion Dip
description: Thank you to our ambassador, Dana Kayal, for this recipe! To use Dana’s words, “It’s hella good.” Serve it with chips or sliced veggies, spread it on burgs and sammies, or dollop onto baked potatoes. For a lower-fat dip, make it with Greek yogurt instead of sour cream.

ingredients.name: plain 2% Greek yogurt or sour cream
3 Onion Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 1 ½ tbsp finely diced green onion

preparation: In a bowl, combine yogurt, mayonnaise, dip mix, and steak rub.
